Title.Text: T E R M İ N L E R

Grid.Name: Sipariş Termin Bilgisi
Grid.FilterString: [DataItem1] = 'Açık' And [DataItem4] <> '03.Numune' And [DataItem4] <> '05.Stok' And [DataItem4] <> '20.T.Üretim' And [DataItem4] <> '04.Tamir' And [DataItem20] <= [DataItem19] And [DataItem5] In (?Tarih)

ListBox.Name: Boyama Şekli
ListBox.FilterString: [DataItem0] Is Not Null And [DataItem0] <> 'FİTİL' And [DataItem0] <> 'TOPS' And [DataItem0] <> 'BUMBS'

Grid.Name: Bugün
Grid.FilterString: [DataItem7] = 'Açık' And IsOutlookIntervalToday([DataItem3]) And [DataItem8] <> '03.Numune' And [DataItem8] <> '10.Ön Sipariş' And [DataItem8] <> '20.T.Üretim' And [DataItem8] <> '05.Stok' And [DataItem10] <= [DataItem4] And [DataItem4] > 9.000000m And [DataItem11] In (?Tarih)

Grid.Name: Bu Hafta
Grid.FilterString: [DataItem7] = 'Açık' And IsThisWeek([DataItem3]) And [DataItem8] <> '03.Numune' And [DataItem8] <> '10.Ön Sipariş' And [DataItem8] <> '20.T.Üretim' And [DataItem8] <> '05.Stok' And [DataItem12] <= [DataItem4] And [DataItem4] > 9.000000m And [DataItem11] In (?Tarih)

Grid.Name: Termini Geçenler
Grid.FilterString: [DataItem7] = 'Açık' And [DataItem3] < LocalDateTimeToday() And [DataItem8] <> '03.Numune' And [DataItem8] <> '10.Ön Sipariş' And [DataItem8] <> '20.T.Üretim' And [DataItem8] <> '05.Stok' And [DataItem4] <= [DataItem11] And [DataItem11] > 9.000000m And [DataItem10] In (?Tarih) And [DataItem3] <> #1900-01-01#
